DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Success Cement Treatment Spinal Compression Fractures
DOC.detailed_description: Patients vertebral compression fracture diagnose treated balloon kyphoplasty . Pain functional status assess baseline , 1- , 12- , 24-months post-operatively use VAS pain scale , Oswestry Disability Index , SF-36 .
